channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 拉扎德（Lazard）表示，债务过重的非洲国家应寻求通过出售碳信用额度来增加财政收入
item.description:
African nations struggling with excessive debt should look to boost their finances through selling carbon credits, says Lazard https://t.co/718Ud9NtDj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 立陶宛央行行长格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，普京入侵乌克兰后被冻结的俄罗斯储备资产应被扣押，以帮助为乌克兰的国防和重建提供资金。
item.description:
The Russian reserve assets frozen after Putin invaded Ukraine should be seized to help fund the defense and reconstruction of that nation, says Gediminas Simkus, who heads Lithuania’s central bank https://t.co/kUhs4kXRbK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 纽约市去年减少了近 78,000 名居民，自 2020 年 4 月以来，居民总数减少了 50 多万人，尽管自大流行病以来居民外流的速度有所放缓
item.description:
New York City lost almost 78,000 residents last year, bringing the total decline to more than half a million since April 2020, even as the pace of the exodus since the pandemic slows https://t.co/XjnwE9BxdI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 在本期《万亿》节目中，我们将深入探讨彭博智库（Bloomberg Intelligence）首次进行的 ETF 调查的结果，以及投资者为何如此看好 ETF。
item.description:
On this episode of Trillions, we dive into the results of the first-ever ETF survey by Bloomberg Intelligence and why investors are so bullish https://t.co/nwBgAUmhNF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 一个刻意平淡的美联储主席、一个极度党派化的国会和两场总统竞选--这就是世界上最强大的中央银行在 2024 年要做的事情：收听华盛顿特区大视野播客
item.description:
An intentionally bland Fed chair, a hyper-partisan Congress and two presidential campaigns – here’s what the world’s most powerful central bank is navigating in 2024: Listen to the Big Take DC podcast https://t.co/t8CEz3Gr3V

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 欧盟贸易负责人警告说，对塑料包装新规则的延迟修改可能会惩罚向该集团出口的较贫穷国家
item.description:
The EU's trade chief warns that late changes to new rules on plastic packaging could penalize poorer countries that export to the bloc https://t.co/hyZZhMThi2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国银行宣布对其资本市场业务的领导层进行多项调整，并成立了一个新的咨询小组，以便在动荡的市场环境中更好地调整其产品。
item.description:
Bank of America announced several leadership changes in its capital markets business and set up a new advisory group to better align its offerings amid volatile market conditions. https://t.co/zdQoba18ij

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 拉脱维亚总理埃维卡-西利纳（Evika Silina）说，如果不支持乌克兰，俄罗斯在冲突中取得胜利，将对包括美国在内的全球产生影响。
item.description:
Latvian Prime Minister Evika Silina said a failure to support Ukraine and a Russian victory in the conflict will have a global impact, including the US. https://t.co/PMD7Vj7ISJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，他倾向于在 6 月份开始降低借贷成本，但强调说通胀已被击败还为时过早。
item.description:
European Central Bank Governing Council member Klaas Knot said he’s leaning toward June to begin lowering borrowing costs, though stressed that it’s premature to say inflation has been defeated. https://t.co/ZxzCLkmJ3v

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 瑞士太阳能电池板制造商迈耶-伯格公司（Meyer Burger）在中国廉价产品的大量涌入迫使其关闭欧洲最大的太阳能工厂之一之后，希望今年在美国开始运营。
item.description:
Swiss solar panel maker Meyer Burger wants to start operations in the US this year after a flood of cheap products from China forced it to close one of Europe’s largest solar factories. https://t.co/GcQXtgImGa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays）称，如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 11 月再次当选，根据他提出的增加关税、刺激经济和削弱对北约承诺的政策建议，美元将有望反弹 3%。
item.description:
The US dollar would be poised to rally 3% if Donald Trump is re-elected in November based on his policy proposals for more tariffs, economic stimulus and a weaker commitment to NATO, according to Barclays https://t.co/9HwWxQBs5I

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 比特币破纪录的涨势使谷歌对这一最大加密货币的搜索量超过了流行偶像泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）和碧昂斯（Beyoncé）。
item.description:
Bitcoin’s record-breaking rally has sent Google searches for the largest cryptocurrency higher than those for pop icons Taylor Swift and Beyoncé https://t.co/A6btkH5Jgf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 本周，大洋两岸不约而同地对外国媒体所有权进行了政治干预。与 @哈利波特经济学一起了解最新消息
item.description:
Political interventions over foreign media ownership are coinciding on both sides of the pond this week. Get the Readout with @hariboconomics https://t.co/F7RqhrdCul

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 最近股市回报率很高。但这并不意味着现在是离职的好时机
item.description:
Returns have been great in the stock market lately. That doesn't mean it's the right time to leave the workforce https://t.co/XwHsMtxA5o

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 国家统计局的 1000 多名英国公务员威胁要举行罢工，要求他们每周至少有两天返回办公室工作
item.description:
More than 1,000 British civil servants at the Office for National Statistics are threatening to strike over demands that they return to the office at least two days a week https://t.co/TsndWVBWoH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱伊向阿根廷各州州长分发了一份经过删减的新版改革方案，希望在重新提交国会之前赢得他们的支持。
item.description:
Javier Milei circulates a new, trimmed version of his reform package to Argentina’s governors in a bid to win their support before he resubmits it to congress https://t.co/gwiV5CCIRW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 纽约市主计长布拉德-兰德（Brad Lander）未能让该市的五家养老基金增加其在经济适用房方面的投资份额
item.description:
NYC Comptroller Brad Lander has failed to get the city’s five pension funds to increase their share of investments in affordable housing https://t.co/7sGOlI1mqe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 彭博贸易追踪报告显示，面对持续的供应链中断，强劲的需求使全球货运出现了不太可能出现的反弹。
item.description:
Resilient demand has allowed global shipments to pull off an unlikely rebound in the face of continuing supply chain disruptions, according to the Bloomberg Trade Tracker https://t.co/rP1ZEiRHHN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 投资者正试图买入已倒闭的加密货币交易所 FTX 的股票，因为如果损失数十亿美元的受害者得到补偿，股票持有者就有可能获得赔偿。
item.description:
Investors are trying to buy up shares of defunct crypto exchange FTX on the off chance that equity holders could see a recovery if victims who lost billions are made whole. https://t.co/DQfe8qLYav

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 波兰民族主义反对派正在为阻止对中央银行行长的有争议的调查做出最后努力
item.description:
Poland’s nationalist opposition is making a last-ditch effort to block a contested probe of the central bank governor https://t.co/VjPFjmLDgF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 法国统计局的预测显示，法国经济正努力实现马克龙控制预算赤字所需的增长。
item.description:
France’s economy is struggling to deliver the growth Macron needs to rein in the budget deficit, Insee forecasts show https://t.co/9AIumFsN1I

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 随着购房者在房地产市场最繁忙的季节得到一些缓解，美国的抵押贷款利率降至 2 月中旬以来的最低点。
item.description:
Mortgage rates in the US fell to the lowest since the middle of February as buyers get some relief during the housing market’s busiest season. https://t.co/mL49LFfULI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 法国兴业银行（SocGen）的策略师认为，如果美股正在形成泡沫，那么在泡沫破灭之前，它还有很大的膨胀空间
item.description:
If a bubble is forming in US stocks, it has plenty of room to expand before it bursts, according to strategists at SocGen https://t.co/c7bw4wvVTl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 伦敦一名法官裁定，自称为比特币创造者的克雷格-赖特并未发明这种加密货币
item.description:
A London judge rules that the self-described creator of Bitcoin, Craig Wright, did not invent the cryptocurrency https://t.co/Wgd05tPYWq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 通胀和劳动力市场的新数据为美联储提供了更多暂缓降息的理由，尽管零售销售表明消费者支出放缓
item.description:
Fresh data on inflation and the labor market gave the Fed more reasons to hold off on cutting rates, even as retail sales suggested a slowdown in consumer spending https://t.co/guUB2kC4dK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 中国驻加拿大大使表示，尽管加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）"不幸 "打击外国投资，但中国将继续在加拿大国内关键矿产领域开展业务
item.description:
China’s ambassador says the country will continue to do business in Canada’s domestic critical minerals sector despite Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s “unfortunate” crackdown on foreign investment https://t.co/FOW0m5Jzfi

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 周四，据 Jiji 新闻社报道，日本央行准备在下周结束负利率政策，日元因此获得短暂提振
item.description:
The yen got a brief boost Thursday from a Jiji news service report that the Bank of Japan is poised to end its negative rate policy next week https://t.co/W9lljxwuwN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 纽约商业银行（NYCB）是一家陷入困境的商业房地产贷款机构，刚刚获得了史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）领导的一个集团的注资，该公司表示，在出售了一个消费贷款组合后，将获得一笔收益
item.description:
NYCB, the troubled commercial real estate lender that just got a capital infusion from a group led by Steven Mnuchin, said it will book a gain after selling a portfolio of consumer loans https://t.co/PGotMqSqRa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 南非收入排名第二的杂货商 Spar 计划削减债务，并在今年退出波兰市场后专注于本土市场。
item.description:
South Africa’s second-largest grocer by revenue, Spar, plans to cut debt and focus on its home market after exiting Poland this year https://t.co/zDc2QxZ2io

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 全球最大的锂生产商阿尔贝马公司计划通过拍卖出售部分金属，并表示这将有助于提高不透明市场的透明度。
item.description:
Albemarle, the world’s biggest lithium producer, plans to sell some of its metal in auctions, which it says will help make an opaque market more transparent. https://t.co/yIQfDqv38T

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024
